title: BlackEnergy
extract: BlackEnergy is a Trojan that is used to conduct DDoS attacks, cyber espionage and information destruction attacks. In 2014 (approximately) a specific user group of BlackEnergy attackers began deploying SCADA-related plugins to victims in the ICS (Industrial Control Systems) and energy markets around the world.
extract_html: BlackEnergy is a Trojan that is used to conduct DDoS attacks, cyber espionage and information destruction attacks. In 2014 (approximately) a specific user group of BlackEnergy attackers began deploying SCADA-related plugins to victims in the ICS (Industrial Control Systems) and energy markets around the world.
